nodes.text: Imperial Energy Systems was a highly productive subdepartment of the Ministry of Energy. Founded in 1 ABY, it specialized in producing large-scale portable power generators to help in disaster relief operations. Imperial Energy Systems was headed by Moff Tiaan Jerjerrod.
In 1 ABY, Cynabar's InfoNet learned that many military ships assigned to the Imperial Energy Systems subministry were involved in shipping raw materials to undisclosed locations.
As Jerjerrod was promoted from Logistics and Supply to command the second Death Star construction project, it is likely this subministry was actually a cover for that project.
